name: Deaths count
description:
Moses munyai  said  i cant make a beatable game that he can not beat so i accepted the challenge , 

 this is how i made a game that moses munyai can not beat

My idea for this game came from Super meat boy and Dark souls , two of my favorite games

At the end i put airtime numbers just to be sure he truly beaten the game

use up arrow key button to jump

key arrows left and right to move

s - to respawn after dying , choose your spot carefully

z - to shoot

d - to kill yourself if you accidentally spawn in a wall 

esc - for pause menu
